info.description:
# Van Artwork Explorer - API Documentation

This postman collection contains all API endpoints for the WMDD 4936 Term Project.

A web application built with Node.js, Express, SQLite, and React.js.

The API provides access to Vancouver Public Art data imported from the Vancouver Open Data Portal.

## Base URL

[https://vancouver-public-art.onrender.com/](https://vancouver-public-art.onrender.com/)

All requests automatically references: {{baseUrl}}/api/v1/arts/...

## Endpoints Overview

The API follows REST conventions and includes the following routes:

### GET Endpoints

1. GET api/v1/arts - returns a lit of arts, 10 per page, supports optional filtering by status.
    
2. GET api/v1/arts/:id - returns detailed information for a single art.
    

## POST Endpoints

1. POST api/v1/arts - creates a new art, requires JSON body with fileds such as title, status, year, location, and image.
    

## PATCH Endpoints

1. PATCH api/v1/arts/:id - updates an existing art, accepts a JSON body with the fields to update.
